EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to GovGrants Internal to review the Grantee Application
EmailTemplate.name: Applications ready for review
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Applications are Ready for Pre-Screen Review of Announcement #{!Announcement__c.AnnouncementId__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Application {!Application__c.Name} for the Funding Opportunity # {!Application__c.Announcement__c} is ready for your review.
The Application {!Application__c.Name} has been submitted for internal review.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely, EGMS Team
